Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Current situation in Kursk oblast, Russia: 🔸 Ukraini...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Current situation in Kursk oblast, Russia:🔸 Ukrainian forces seem to have captured Makhnovka and advanced east of Sudzha.🔸 Russian forces continue to encounter sabotage groups and enemy forces as they continue building defensive lines.🔸 There was an attack on bridge over the Seim River in Glushkovsky district with missiles, which hit a convoy of troops from Donetsk and cut off part of the district.
